identity.headline: Technical Lead | Product Manager | DevOps Engineer

summary.short: Product-focused technical leader with strong DevOps and full-stack engineering background.
summary.long: Strategic technical leader with 5+ years of experience bridging engineering, DevOps, and product strategy to build scalable SaaS platforms. Proven track record in leading cross-functional teams, defining product roadmaps, architecting cloud infrastructure, and delivering measurable business impact including 40% performance improvements and 25% cost optimization. Strong hands-on expertise in Python, Docker, Kubernetes, and modern web technologies.

roles.title: Technical Co-Founder & Lead Engineer
achievements: Architected full technical strategy for a compliance-focused SaaS platform
Built and led an engineering team of 3–4 developers
Designed CI/CD pipelines with Docker and Kubernetes reducing deployment time by 50%
Improved system reliability to 99.5% uptime and reduced costs by 25%

roles.title: Co-founder & Technical Product Manager
achievements: Owned product roadmap and feature prioritization
Coordinated cross-team delivery between engineering, business, and stakeholders

roles.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Developed backend systems using Python and Frappe
Customized WordPress solutions and automated infrastructure using Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins

roles.title: Technical Lead & Product Manager
achievements: Defined and executed product roadmap aligned with business objectives
Implemented analytics, A/B testing, and feedback loops
Reduced operational overhead by 25% via DevOps automation

roles.title: Software Engineer II & Project Coordinator
achievements: Delivered 20+ page website with 100% on-time delivery
Improved engagement by 20% and reduced load times by 15%
Trained 4+ team members on Jira and agile workflows

roles.title: Senior WordPress Developer / Software Engineer
achievements: Developed 2 custom plugins improving performance by 25%
Reduced load times by 40% for Digital Leadership platform
Improved organic traffic by 15%

roles.title: Software Engineer & Technical Lead
achievements: Improved load time by 20% and engagement by 15%
Automated 80% of server infrastructure using Docker
Implemented GTM tracking for 90% of user interactions

roles.title: Front-end Developer & Project Coordinator
achievements: Delivered 3+ WordPress projects end-to-end
Improved site speed by 40% and traffic by 25%
Built secure e-commerce solutions reducing downtime by 50%

projects.name: DEPI Final Project – DevOps Technical Lead
